text: +1 TC. Lightweight and breathable.
+1 TC; +1 to Stealth checks.
+1 TC; reduce fall damage by 5.
+1 TC; ignore heat environmental penalties.
+2 TC; +1 to STR or DEX saves.
+2 TC; advantage on saves vs weather/environment.
+2 TC; resist slashing once/day.
+2 TC; warns before surprise rounds (no flat-footed penalty).
+3 TC; advantage vs being knocked prone.
+3 TC; resistance to poison, acid, or radiation (choose one).
+3 TC; +1 SP if hit by an AoE.
+3 TC; +5 ft movement.
+3 TC; +1 SP regen when not hit during a round.
+3 TC; ignore difficult terrain.
+3 TC; first hit each encounter is reduced by 5.
+3 TC; +1 DEX save and resistance to psychic.
+4 TC; once/session auto-block one physical hit.
+3 TC; +2 Initiative while worn.
+3 TC; resistance to force and psychic.
+4 TC; if an attacker misses once, they take −1 to hit thereafter.
+3 TC; when hit, teleport 10 ft once/short rest.
+4 TC; immunity to the first critical hit against you each day.
+1 TC vs melee.
+1 TC; +1 INT saves.
+1 TC while moving.
+1 TC; resistance to grappling.
+2 TC vs ranged attacks.
+2 TC; attacker takes 1 lightning damage on a miss.
+2 TC vs blunt/force.
+2 TC vs fire/cold-based powers.
+2 TC; negate one elemental attack per day.
+2 TC; phase through one AoE per combat.
+2 TC; 50% miss chance once/day for enemies.
+2 TC; recharge 1 SP when you roll a natural 20.
+3 TC; reactive +1 TC boost if hit.
+3 TC; reflect one ranged hit per encounter.
+3 TC; +1 CON save when resisting critical hits.
+3 TC; adjacent allies gain +1 TC.
Once/day, allies within 10 ft gain +2 TC for 1 round.
+2 TC; teleport 5 ft as a reaction to being targeted.
+3 TC; store 1 blocked hit and unleash it as force damage next turn.
+3 TC; once/round shift damage to the next round.
+3 TC; grant total concealment once/day.
+3 TC; allies within 15 ft cannot be surprised.
+1 TC during the first round.
+1 TC; teleport 5 ft as a bonus action once/long rest.
+1 TC; blind one adjacent attacker as a reaction (1/day).
+1 TC vs elemental terrain effects.
+2 TC while under 50% HP.
+2 TC for 1 round after spending 3+ SP.
+2 TC vs AoE effects.
+2 TC; ignore environment conditions for 1 hour.
+1 TC and +1 Passive Perception.
Once/day, reroute one ranged power away from you.
+2 TC when moving more than 15 ft.
Once/day, negate one condition on yourself.
+2 TC; ignore difficult terrain while active.
+2 TC; steal 1 SP when you dodge.
+2 TC; immune to Burn, Freeze, or Stun (choose each day).
+3 TC for 1 turn when hit (1/short rest).
Once/day reset position & TC to start of turn.
Emit a wave that gives all allies +2 TC for 1 round.
+2 TC; allies within 5 ft gain +1 TC.
Reflect a failed attack once per scene.
Share your TC with an ally within 10 ft for 1 round.
Immune to critical hits and one chosen damage type for 1 turn.
